::Najah::

"Wait... Wait Owl..." Replied Najah" You started all messsss... when 
you attacked at the nice furr-ball. You wasssss in Alliance'ssss 
territory you ssssssshould have followed Alliance'ssss Rulesssss, 
that it issss the sssssame to follow Zardusss's Rulesssss.We're 
giving you the thing that you desssserve....You broked the rulesss 
now face the mussssic nd don't complaint. Have a bit humiliti will be 
good for you... And why are you complaiting, parrot? Ssssstill you're 
alive and ssstill I can't kill you, you sssshould be thankful for 
that."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> "A royal pain in the waste removal port." was all Lady Hawk could 
> think. "Then a little professional courtesy should be in order." 
She 
> stared at Najah eye to scaley eye. She was tired of carrying this 
> reptile all this way. "Would you wish to be treated with such 
> indignity by two bots carrying weapons while you were unarmed?"
> She'd hoped to play on Najahs sense of fair play knowing that 
Snakes 
> and Lawers hadn't any conscience.
